author: cmpilato
msg: Allow users to specify the path of msgfmt, and key off that setting as to
whether to use the thing or not.

author: ringstrom
msg: Fix the inheritence of SVNPathAuthz and SVNAutoversioning by turning
them into tri-state values (default, on, off).  SVNPathAuthz (which
is On by default) cannot be set to Off without this change.
See INHERIT_VALUE and dav_svn_merge_dir_config to understand how
(dav_svn_create_dir_config): Zero is default for all values now.
(dav_svn_get_autoversioning_flag): It's only on if it's explicitly
(dav_svn_get_pathauthz_flag): It's only off if it's explicitly set

author: plasma
msg: Update Traditional Chinese translation in trunk.
* Fix two fuzzy messages in branches/1.1.x.
